documentation.text:
@dev Interface for an ERC1820 implementer, as defined in the
 https://eips.ethereum.org/EIPS/eip-1820#interface-implementation-erc1820implementerinterface[EIP].
 Used by contracts that will be registered as implementers in the
 {IERC1820Registry}.

devdoc.details: Interface for an ERC1820 implementer, as defined in the https://eips.ethereum.org/EIPS/eip-1820#interface-implementation-erc1820implementerinterface[EIP]. Used by contracts that will be registered as implementers in the {IERC1820Registry}.

canImplementInterfaceForAddress(bytes32,.details: Returns a special value (`ERC1820_ACCEPT_MAGIC`) if this contract implements `interfaceHash` for `account`. See {IERC1820Registry-setInterfaceImplementer}.
